title: Textile, mid 19th century
medium:
Madium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and block printed; glazed
description: Two samples with same ground design, printed in different color patterns. Ground, broad grey stripe of minute wavy lines alternating with white stripe with foliage edge. A) Sprays of lilac, azalea and asters in violet. B) Same flowers in grey. Glazed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, mid 19th century.Madium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and block printed; glazed. 1967-10-19-a.
